description.original: Hand write or draw directly between paragraphs in your notes using a digital pen, stylus, or Apple pencil. Useful for handwriting, sketches, scribbles, or even math equations and scientific notation. Runs on the tldraw framework and drawing provides an infinite canvas.
description.translation: 使用数字笔、手写笔或 Apple  Pencil 直接在笔记段落之间手写或绘图。适用于手写、草图、涂鸦，甚至是数学方程式和科学符号。本插件运行在tldraw框架上，提供无限的画布。

dict..setText(`Ink is all about enabling styl: .setText(`Ink 旨在直接在您的 Markdown 笔记中使用手写笔`)
dict..setText(`Here's a quick rundown to help: .setText(`以下为快速概览，可以帮助您开始使用……`)
dict..setText(`In any markdown note, run the: .setText(`In any markdown note, run the following command to begin writing where your cursor is.`)
dict..setText(`You can turn them on in the se: .setText(`You can turn them on in the settings (and restart Obsidian) if you'd like to begin using them.`)
dict..setText(`Ink files live in your vault a: .setText(`Ink files live in your vault and can sync with it to other devices.`)
dict..setText(`If using Obsidian Sync, turn o: .setText(`If using Obsidian Sync, turn on "Sync all other types" in the Obsidian Sync settings.`)
dict..setText(`Ink is under construction. Thi: .setText(`Ink is under construction. This means it has features missing and sometimes has bugs.`)
dict..setText(`If you notice any, please repo: .setText(`If you notice any, please report them through the link in the settings.`)
dict..setText(\"Hand write or draw directly b: .setText("Hand write or draw directly between paragraphs in your notes.")
dict..setText(`You may have noticed that your: .setText(`You may have noticed that your handwriting lines have started disapearing...`)
dict..setText(`Hiding old strokes helps keep: .setText(`Hiding old strokes helps keep pen latency down and the writing experience smooth.`)
dict..setText(`Never fear though, all your st: .setText(`Never fear though, all your strokes still exist and will become visible again later.`)
dict..setText(`You can adjust the stroke limi: .setText(`You can adjust the stroke limit in the settings.`)
dict..setText(`Customise the attachment folde: .setText(`Customise the attachment folder in Ink's settings.`)
dict..setText(`Remove an embed section throug: .setText(`Remove an embed section through the menu next to the lock button.`)
dict..setText(`Additional problem solving tip: .setText(`Additional problem solving tips added to Ink's settings.`)
dict..setName(`Where should Ink files be save: .setName(`在笔记中创建的 Ink 文件应该被保存在何处？`)
dict..setName(\"Show frame around drawing whe: .setName("在非编辑状态下显示绘图边框")
dict..setDesc(`For a more intuitive experienc: .setDesc(`为了获得更直观地使用体验，打开Obsidian设置-核心插件中的“斜杠指令”，或安装启用社区插件“Slash Commander”.`)
dict..setDesc(`If using an iPad, the Apple pe: .setDesc(`如果您使用iPad，Apple Pencil 的“随手写”功能可能会干扰到本插件的书写。建议在 iPadOS 设置中关闭该功能以获得更好的体验`)
dict..setDesc(`If using \"Obsidian Sync\", tu: .setDesc(`如果使用 Obsidian 官方同步，请打开同步设置中的“同步所有其他类型文件”`)
dict..setDesc(\"If disabled, you will not be: .setDesc("如果禁用此功能，您将无法添加新的手写(Writing)，已经嵌入的将显示为原始代码。在Obsidian中现有的手写文件会被隐藏，但它们仍然存在于磁盘上。更改此设置需要重启Obsidian才能生效")
.setDesc("如果禁用此功能，您将无法添加新的绘图(Drawing)，已经嵌入的将显示为原始代码。在Obsidian中现有的绘图文件会被隐藏，但它们仍然存在于磁盘上。更改此设置需要重启Obsidian才能生效")
dict..createEl(\"p\", { text: `For informatio: .createEl("p", { text: `有关此插件开发的更多信息，请访问以下链接。欢迎在YouTube上的发展日记中留下评论。` })
dict..createEl(\"p\", { text: `While editing: .createEl("p", { text: `当编辑一个 MarkDown 文件时，运行“Insert new hand drawn section”操作，以嵌入一个画板` })
.createEl("p", { text: `当编辑一个 MarkDown 文件时，运行“Insert new handwriting section”操作，以嵌入一个用笔书写的部分` })
dict..createEl(\"summary\", { text: `This plu: .createEl("summary", { text: `此插件正处于 Alpha 开发阶段（展开以查看更多）` })
dict..createEl(\"p\", { text: `What does Alph: .createEl("p", { text: `Alpha 是什么意思？插件产品开发通常涉及经历多个不同的阶段（例如：Alpha、Beta，然后是标准发布版本）` })
dict..createEl(\"p\", { text: `Alpha, the cur: .createEl("p", { text: `目前的版本是 Alpha, 意思是此插件正处于早期开发阶段，可能存在大型修改或更改之前的功能` })
